body_html:
@vrv
I tried to rebuild tensorflow after, executing your instruction, still no luck

eddie7@albus:~/lab/tensorflow$ ~/lab/bazel/bazel-bin/src/bazel build -j 1 --spawn_strategy=standalone
.......
INFO: Found 0 targets...
INFO: Elapsed time: 2.096s, Critical Path: 0.01s
eddie7@albus:~/lab/tensorflow$ ~/lab/bazel/bazel-bin/src/bazel clean
INFO: Starting clean (this may take a while). Consider using --expunge_async if the clean takes more than several minutes.
eddie7@albus:~/lab/tensorflow$ git pull
remote: Counting objects: 34, done.
remote: Total 34 (delta 28), reused 28 (delta 28), pack-reused 5
Unpacking objects: 100% (34/34), done.
From https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
   f88fb6f..8242b4d  master     -> origin/master
 * [new tag]         0.6.0      -> 0.6.0
Updating f88fb6f..8242b4d
Fast-forward
 tensorflow/core/public/version.h                                | 2 +-
 tensorflow/models/image/imagenet/BUILD                          | 1 +
 tensorflow/python/BUILD                                         | 1 +
 tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/parsing_ops_test.py              | 4 ++--
 tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/sparse_serialization_ops_test.py | 2 +-
 tensorflow/python/ops/gradients.py                              | 2 +-
 tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops_test.py                         | 4 ++--
 tensorflow/tools/pip_package/setup.py                           | 2 +-
 8 files changed, 10 insertions(+), 8 deletions(-)
eddie7@albus:~/lab/tensorflow$ ./configure 
Please specify the location of python. [Default is /usr/bin/python]: 
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with GPU support? [y/N] n
No GPU support will be enabled for TensorFlow
Configuration finished
eddie7@albus:~/lab/tensorflow$ ~/lab/bazel/bazel-bin/src/bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
ERROR: /home/eddie7/lab/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorboard/bower/BUILD:3:1: no such package '@mocha//': https://github.com/mochajs/mocha.git: cannot open git-upload-pack and referenced by '//tensorflow/tensorboard/bower:bower'.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 129.614s

it seems issue with bazel rather than tensorflow, as far as I think.
I have never used bazel before too, so can't tell anything

@vrv 
I tried to rebuild tensorflow after, executing your instruction, still no luck

```
eddie7@albus:~/lab/tensorflow$ ~/lab/bazel/bazel-bin/src/bazel build -j 1 --spawn_strategy=standalone
```
